name: Pigeon Pizza Peril
description:
Silly Platformer about a pizza chef having a bad day. 

Art, code and music by me during the game jam week. Completed for the Wildot gamejam in Godot. 

I had a lot of fun building this out and learned a lot about godot.. If people like it I think there will be a sequel, with more pigeons and more peril! 

It runs fine on browser for most people but if you have trouble running it in the browser try downloading the executable for your OS.
